snippet: The NCAA and 11 conferences that have played major college football in recent years have filed a motion to dismiss two antitrust lawsuits that accuse the association of illegally capping compensation to athletes....

headline.print_headline: NCAA Asks for Dismissal of 2 Scholarship Lawsuits
headline.main: NCAA Asks for Dismissal of 2 Scholarship Lawsuits

lead_paragraph: The NCAA and 11 conferences that have played major college football in recent years have filed a motion to dismiss two antitrust lawsuits that accuse the association of illegally capping compensation to athletes.
